scm-repository-template-plugin.templateHelpText: The Repository, that should be used as a template.

info.helpText: You need help with your template file? Have a look for the official

description.template: Mark the repository as template. A "template.yaml" is created in the root directory, which includes all files and folders of this repository in the template. For restrictions or filters this "template.yaml" can be customized.
description.untemplate: Unmark the repository as template. The "template.yaml" will be deleted from the repository.

ErSA4q8eJ1.description: The template yaml could not be parsed. Please check your template definition.

4JSA4ucU51.description: The file could not be templated.
